thought: To craft light_gray_wool, I need to craft white_wool. To craft white_wool, I need to place 4 strings in a 2x2 square in the crafting table. Therefore, I will move the string at slot 44 into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
